# Dataset
***

Adjacency matrix has a lot of variation..

- Directed / Not directed
- Weighted / Unweighted
- Adjacency (rows=cols) / Incidence matrix (rows != cols)

Thus we will consider several datasets to represents these possibilities.

- Twitter network of #Python #Rstats and #Dataviz
- Publication network of co-authors
- Migration flow from one country to the other.


```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(circlize)
library(migest)



demo(cfplot_reg, package = "migest", ask = FALSE)

# Load dataset from github
data <- read.table("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/holtzy/data_to_viz/master/Example_dataset/7_OneCatOneNum.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
```
